text: Michael Kantor (born August 7, 1939) is an American politician and lawyer. After serving as the Clinton-Gore campaign chair in 1992, Kantor was appointed United States Trade Representative, holding that office from 1993 to 1996. He was, in 1996 and 1997, United States Secretary of Commerce. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Kantor on Clinton * Kantor on free trade Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:United States Secretaries of Commerce Category:United States Trade Representatives Category:Jewish American politicians Category:Businesspeople from Nashville, Tennessee Category:Politicians from Nashville, Tennessee Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Lawyers from Nashville, Tennessee
title: Mickey Kantor
